alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 9:34AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A PERIOD OF LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHERN CARROLL AND NORTHERN FREDERICK COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND... At 932 AM EST, an area of light to moderate snow was located over portions of north-central Maryland. Snow will coat the ground in spots this morning, and with temperatures near freezing this may coat untreated surfaces as well. Wind gusts around 30 to 40 mph combined with the snow may reduce visibility to near one-half mile at times. Locations impacted include... Westminster, Thurmont, Taneytown, Hampstead, Manchester, Myersville, Woodsboro, Union Bridge, Harney, Lineboro, New Midway, Ladiesburg, Utica, Rocky Ridge, Linwood, Detour, Uniontown, Millers, Greenmount, and Keysville. This includes Interstate 70 in Maryland near mile marker 42. Be prepared for slippery surfaces when traveling. Slow down and allow extra time to get to your destination.
